org.jclouds.osgi
Class MetadataBundleListener

java.lang.Object
  org.jclouds.osgi.MetadataBundleListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleListener
public class MetadataBundleListener
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleListener

A BundleListener that listens for BundleEvent and searches for ProviderMetadata and in newly installed Bundles. This is used as a workaround for OSGi environments where the ServiceLoader cannot cross bundle boundaries.
